text: @amandamilling @EnvAgency @TipStench This stink really is too much, especially at a time when we are only allowed to mix out doors. @Biffa are a blight on Cannock and surrounding areas, a blight on living standards and a blight on our properties.
RT @joanne_dodd: @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink
@ADA_updates @NewLifeOldWest @debbiejay35 @FenEdgeTrail @cambsacre @Elygroupofidbs @EnvAgencyAnglia @MLCnavigation @eauotter Thanks ADA  -Cliffs legacy...

text:
@Biffa @amandamilling @EnvAgency @TipStench 

Surprise, Surprise,  yet again all you can smell in Heath Hayes and surrounding areas is the rancid stench from Poplars Landfill. This issue was supposed to be fixed, this is the third day this week. Sick to the back teeth of it.

entity.name: Dragons' Den
entity.description: Budding entrepreneurs get three minutes to pitch their business ideas to five multi-millionaires who are willing to invest their own cash, time and expertise to kick-start the business. After the pitch the Dragons have the opportunity to ask questions about the venture. The entrepreneurs don't always have to answer, but of course, what they choose not to address could very well affect the outcome. The pitch is over when each of the Dragons has declared, `I'm out,' or when they secure the full investment that they are asking for. Evan Davis presents.
